Fonts

By default, Fajny CSS uses Nunito Sans Black for the titles, and Muli for the texts.
You can change them by editing the file scss/_fonts.scss.

File to include

@include "fonts";

Titles Display

H1 title display

H2 Title display

H3 Title display

H4 Title display

H5 Title display
<h1 class="display">H1 title display</h1>
<h2 class="display">H2 Title display</h2>
<h3 class="display">H3 Title display</h3>
<h4 class="display">H4 Title display</h4>
<h5 class="display">H5 Title display</h5>

Paragraph

Strong Italic Links

Paragraph with code inside

<p>Paragraph</p>
<strong>Strong</strong>
<em>Italic</em>
<a href="#" class="links">Links</a>
<p>Paragraph with <code>code</code> inside</p>

     <li class="breadcrumbs-active">Breadcrumbs active</li>
</ul>
